name: Supplier Wise Item Sales Summary
query:
SELECT sup.supplier as "Supplier:Data:200",
   si_item.item_code as "Item Code:Data:200",
   si_item.item_name as "Item Name:320",
   IF(itm.disabled = 0,"Enabled", disabled) as "Item Status:Data:200",
   sum(si_item.base_net_amount)  as "Net Sales:Currency:200",
  sum(iv.valuation_rate*si_item.stock_qty) as "COGS:Currency:200",
   sum(si_item.base_net_amount) - sum(ifnull(iv.valuation_rate*si_item.stock_qty,0)) as "Profit:Currency:200",

(sum(si_item.base_net_amount - ifnull(iv.valuation_rate*si_item.stock_qty,0)) / sum(si_item.base_net_amount) * 100 )as "Profit Percent:Percent:200", 


sum(si_item.stock_qty)   as "Sold Qty:Int:200",
   (
          SELECT sum(actual_qty)
          FROM   `tabBin`
          WHERE  item_code = si_item.item_code
          ) as "Bal Qty:Int:200",
   (
          SELECT sum(actual_qty)
          FROM   `tabBin`
          WHERE  item_code = si_item.item_code
          )/sum(si_item.stock_qty) as "Lead Factor:Float:200",
   (sum(si_item.base_net_amount) / sum(si_item.stock_qty)) as "AVG SP:Float:200",
   (avg(iv.valuation_rate)) as "AVG Cost:Float:200",
   (
          SELECT cl_1
          FROM   `tabItem`
          WHERE  item_code = si_item.item_code) as "CL 1:Data:200",
   (
          SELECT cl_2
          FROM   `tabItem`
          WHERE  item_code = si_item.item_code) as "CL 2:Data:200"
FROM   `tabSales Invoice` si
JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` as si_item on si_item.parent = si.name
left outer join `tabItem` itm on itm.item_code = si_item.item_code
left outer JOIN `tabItem Supplier` sup ON sup.parent = si_item.item_code
left outer join item_val_rate as iv on (iv.item_code = si_item.item_code and (iv.posting_date = si.posting_date or iv.posting_date = ''))
where si.docstatus = 1  
AND (si.posting_date) >=%(from_date)s
AND (si.posting_date) <=%(to_date)s
          
GROUP  BY sup.supplier, si_item.item_code
